channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Anker’s handy little 3-port charger is just 35 bucks
item.description: Earlier this year, I decided to level up my travel game and invest in a charger to bring on trips, rather than raiding my desk outlets every time I packed. I needed a multitasker, something that could power my MacBook Air, charge my phone, and accommodate the random USB-A cord I always seem to need […]

item.title: I’ve tested every modern Samsung Galaxy Watch, and they’re all on sale – these are the best deals

item.title: The best gaming headset I tried this year is $60 off for Black Friday
item.description: Earlier this year, I reviewed the Fractal Scape, a wireless gaming headset made for PC (also compatible with Switch 2) that really wowed me. Frankly, I wasn’t expecting much in this debut headset from a company known mostly for making PC cases, but it’s one of the most thoughtfully-designed models that I’ve tried recently. If […]

item.title: 169 Best Black Friday Deals 2025: Everything Tested and Actually Discounted
item.description: We have scoured the entire internet to find the best Black Friday deals on gear we've tested and approved.

item.title: The 200 Black Friday deals you can still get
item.description: Black Friday is technically a thing of the past, but many of the best deals we told you about yesterday — including deep discounts on the AirPods Pro 3, the Pixel Watch 4, and the latest Kindle Paperwhite — are still kicking for now. In some cases, gadgets are out of stock at certain stores, […]

item.title: FBI says hackers have stolen $262 million in account takeover scams in 2025 so far - here's how you can stay safe
item.description: Cybercriminals have stolen hundreds of millions through AI-driven phishing, fake stores, and account takeover scams targeting users across financial platforms.

item.title: No Fire TV Stick? No problem - this Roku Streaming Stick HD now costs as much as my Chipotle order
item.description: The cheap Fire TV Stick alternative is now just $15

item.title: Airbus orders software fix to thousands of planes due to solar radiation risk
item.description: Flights were delayed and cancelled globally after Airbus ordered fixes to 6,000 of its A320 series planes, according to The Guardian. The company said it’s taking action because “analysis of a recent event involving an A320 Family aircraft has revealed that intense solar radiation may corrupt data critical to the functioning of flight controls.” Citing […]...

item.title: I'm a VPN expert, and I've found the 3 Black Friday VPN deals you need to pick up while you still can!

item.title: Black Friday sets online spending record of $11.8B, Adobe says
item.description: American consumers spent $11.8 billion online on Black Friday, according to data from Adobe Analytics, which says it tracks more than 1 trillion visits to U.S. retail websites.
